Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the damage to the Russian-made air defense system, implying that it was completely destroyed in the attack.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos actually show a Russian-made S-300 air defense system that was damaged in an accident, not destroyed in an attack on Armenia.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the air defense system was destroyed in an attack on Armenia.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos are evidence of an attack on Armenia, when in fact they show an accident involving the air defense system.
Exist alternative explanation: The photos have an alternative explanation, which is that they depict an accident at a missile base in southwestern Russia.
